content: विवर्तनं {@--1@} Revolving, revolution, whirling round. {@--2@} Rolling about, turning round; शय्याप्रांतविवर्तनैर्विगमयत्युन्निद्र एव क्षपाः <ls>Ś. 6. 4</ls>; <ls>Ve. 2. 8</ls>, <ls n="Ve.">5. 40</ls>: <ls>Mv. 7. 5.</ls> {@--3@} Rolling back, returning. {@--4@} Rolling down, descending. {@--5@} Existing, abiding. {@--6@} Reverential salutation. {@--7@} Passing through various states or existences. {@--8@} An altered condition; पुनरकांडविवर्ननदारुणो प्रविशितष्टि विधिर्तनसो रुजं <ls>U. 4. 15</ls>; <ls>Māl. 4. 7.</ls>
